product_name: Shimano Ultegra FD-6800 11-Speed Front Derailleur - Double
long_description: Built for quick shifts at racing speeds, the Shimano FD-6800 Ultegra 11-Speed Double Front Derailleur finds the right gear quickly and efficiently. Wide outer and inner link design boosts strength and rigidity. You'll notice featherlight downshifting and a smooth shifting stroke thanks to the perfect amount of spring tension. Even when out of the saddle, shifting from low to high gears is smooth and easy. The Shimano FD-6800 Ultegra 11-Speed Double Front Derailleur is for use with double-chainring crankset. Features an updated support bolt for more stable contact to the frame (brazed-on boss frame).
short_description: Built for quick shifts at racing speeds, the Shimano FD-6800 Ultegra 11-Speed Double Front Derailleur finds the right gear quickly and efficiently.
